channel.title: Homes on Ross Maciejewski's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Ross Maciejewski's Homepage

item.description: Biography Ross Maciejewski is a Professor at Arizona State University and Director of the School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence. He serves as the co-Director of the Center for Accelerating Operational Efficiency - a Department of Homeland Security Center of Excellence. His primary research interests are in the areas of visualization and explainable AI. He has served on the organizing committees for the IEEE Conference on Visual Analytics Science and Technology, the IEEE/VGTC EuroVis Conference, and as the co-chair of the Visualization Executive Committee (VEC) (2021 - 2024).
